item.title: CVE-2024-34789|2024-06-03T10:58:27.616Z -- WP Hait -- Post Grid Elementor Addon
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Hait Post Grid Elementor Addon allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Post Grid Elementor Addon: from n/a through 2.0.16.
